idea:
Quadridge was incorporated in India, as a Private Limited Company in 2015. We are an innovative technology company, providing customer centric solutions in the areas of communication, corporate collaboration, content management and customer empowerment. Quadridge has developed an online communication collaboration suite that includes collaborative audio/video conferencing with real time annotation, webinars and corporate webcasts.  


We have also developed Samvaad,  an enterprise grade mobile and desktop messaging application that focuses on privacy, reliability, security and speed. Samvaad can be integrated with existing enterprise applications to provide seamless connectivity and communication across the enterprise.
name: QUADRIDGE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We, at Faroce a Division of NDNYA business solutions private limited, are in the business of providing expert advice through an online platform. 

Faroce addresses business challenges that small or big business companies undergo. We assist business owners in every step of their entrepreneurial journey by giving them the right advice from our Faroce industry expert in a timely and simplified manner.


We connect budding entrepreneurs with industry experts to discuss challenges and reconfirm business decisions. Faroce has established a robust network of experienced industry experts and mentors to provide useful advice to businesses and to facilitate discussions that leads towards creative and economical output.
name: faroce

idea: We are working with the National Physical Laboratory (NPL) to develop plastic tiles/paver blocks which are made out of waste plastic material.
name: NAS Industries

idea:
We are a team of like-minded individual who believes eCommerce is the face of new economy. With the fast evolving digital environment, we realized that setting up and growing a business online is a challenging task for any entity. With the intention of serving them and to realise full potential of digital world FinPlus came into existence.​

We have a young and dynamic team of people with diverse expertise. The team is a combination of Chartered Accountants, Management graduates, online market experts who takes pride in serving partner brands in every step of their online journey and enjoys each other success.

Our motivation lies in the appreciation we get from our partner brands which inspires us to excel further.

Our philosophy is to create value for Society, employees, customers, and business ethically and diligently. We care deeply about our work and the impact it has on the world. We apply our talent, hustle, and willpower to every challenge we take on. We treat our clients like partners and our team members like family. As a company, we want to create a culture which encourages creativity and innovations. We are a team which is agile loves challenges, keeps evolving, and enjoys each other’s success in the process. We are #TeamFinPlus.
name: FinPlus Business Solutions LLP

idea: Sugoe Software is into developing customized advanced Machine Learning models and products for finance and Insurance Industry. We use artificial intelligence and combine modern machine learning algorithms to create advanced ML models and data analysis tool which can be used by various industries and domains. Our goal is to create plug and play tools (software products) which any banks, insurance companies etc can directly plug into their inhouse automation tools including CRM and ERP to directly enhance their existing products and have enhanced functionality to their products
